welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mango, a charming city known for its welcoming atmosphere and quaint local shops. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport houses all of the airport's airline check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside F
terminals.description: Airside F is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zephyrhills Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Zephyrhills Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
